name: Happy Writing
overview: Magic slate. Flashback. Remember the mistress who squeaks the chalk on the blackboard by writing beautiful round and thin lines that had to be copied with application on her notebook. Today, the mistress is called Magic Slate, she knows ten sets of words plus all those you want to suggest to her and her writing speed is flexible. One regret: this is software that would have found its full value combined with an optical pen. It is not planned on Amstrad.
